pt.ua.concurrent

Class MutexCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.concurrent.CObject
      • pt.ua.concurrent.MutexCV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterruptibleAwaitingThreads, SyncCV

    public class MutexCV
extends CObject
implements SyncCV
    Mutex condition variable class.

    This class follows DbC(tm) methodology (Wikipedia). Where possible, contracts are implement with native's Java assert.

    Version:
    0.5, November 2011
    Author:
    Miguel Oliveira e Silva (mos@ua.pt)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void await()
      Object's wait replacement, in which:
      - the checked exception InterruptedException, is replaced by the unchecked exception ThreadInterruptedException;
      - supports the registration of waiting threads for interrupt purposes.

      Object's wait replacement, in which:
      - the checked exception InterruptedException, is replaced by the unchecked exception ThreadInterruptedException;
      - supports the registration of waiting threads for interrupt purposes; - timeout expiration can be tested using the method's result.

        Overrides:
        await in class CObject

      • await

        public boolean await(long millis)
        Description copied from class: CObject
        Object's wait replacement, in which:
        - the checked exception InterruptedException, is replaced by the unchecked exception ThreadInterruptedException;
        - supports the registration of waiting threads for interrupt purposes; - timeout expiration can be tested using the method's result. Important: Unlike Object's timed wait methods, CObject's timeout await methods require a non-zero timeout.
        Precondition:
        millis >= 0 - non negative timeout
        syncronizedLockIsMine() - native lock owned by me
        Overrides:
        await in class CObject
        Parameters:
        millis - timeout (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        false if await terminated due to a timeout expiration, true otherwise

        public boolean lockIsMine()
        Description copied from class: CObject
        Is lock owned by me?
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
